data.message: My business name is Marketing nSight, LLC, however, I can't name my new page this as FB isn't allowing a lower case n to start the second word followed by an upper case letter. The business is officially named this and I need to be able to name my FB page the same. Please help make this possible.

replies.message: Hey Janet. For questions about Pages and ads, please reach out to our team at facebook.com/marketing. -Jordan

How can I talk to a human being directly about this problem? I have not found any support on this topic online. The marketing page helps with ads. I'm not interested in support for that. I need help being able to name my page to reflect my official business name. Please direct me to a person who can help me resolve this issue.
